title: State of the union’s cardiovascular health: gains, but not for everyone
description: The American College of Cardiology found uneven gains and sobering declines in heart health. "You can't treat your way out of a prevention problem," an author said.
content: The American College of Cardiology found uneven gains and sobering declines in heart health. "You can't treat your way out of a prevention problem," an author said.
